questions.question: What technological component does Jesse Pollak state will power the ability for users to configure webhook filters using natural language in the App Studio agent?
questions.explanation: Jesse Pollak states the same MCP tool powering dev.neynar.com will also power the App Studio agent for natural language configuration (12/23/2025).

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT listed as one of Jesse Pollak's top three priorities from November 2025?
options: Neynar AI: add agent capabilities, build in-feed agents
Full decentralization of the Base sequencer
App studio: vibe code mini apps
questions.explanation: The three priorities listed were Developer infra, Neynar AI/agent capabilities, and App Studio/vibe code mini apps (11/26/2025).

questions.question: According to the Anthropic report Jesse Pollak shared, AI agents went from exploiting 2% of vulnerabilities post-March 2025 to what percentage by December 2025?
questions.explanation: The post quotes the increase from 2% to 55.88% of vulnerabilities exploited (12/02/2025).

questions.question: What specific data point does Dan Romero claim for his personal Farcaster usage in the app?
questions.explanation: Dan Romero states, 'My Quotient Score is 1.000!' (12/17/2025).

questions.question: Following the statement 'We read a chain now,' what action does Jesse Pollak indicate is next for development?
options: We write to a chain next.
We secure the validator set next.
questions.explanation: Jesse Pollak states, 'We read a chain now, we write to a chain next' (12/04/2025).

questions.question: Brian Armstrong specifically asks Neynar for an API endpoint related to which type of technology, integrated with Farcaster knowledge?
questions.explanation: Brian Armstrong asks if Neynar has an 'api endpoint for llm, like openai? i'm looking for a llm with farcaster knowledge' (12/28/2025).

questions.question: What primary issue arose when the House team ran the Clanker presale using the v4 functionality?
options: The presale mechanism experienced a critical bug.
The presale sold out immediately before being announced in the app.
The price discovery mechanism led to massive underestimation.
The funds were accidentally redirected to the liquidity pool.
questions.explanation: Dan Romero explained that the presale 'sold out immediately -- before we had a chance to announce it in the app' (12/15/2025).

questions.question: Which Farcaster user did Jesse Pollak request Neynar to create a ticket for?
questions.explanation: Jesse Pollak directed Neynar to 'make @grin a ticket for this' (12/12/2025).

questions.question: What specific aesthetic feature did Brian Armstrong mention he wanted for Christmas?
questions.explanation: Brian Armstrong posted, 'i want animated pfps for christmas' (12/25/2025).

questions.question: Dan Romero mentioned considering Clanker Auctions alongside what other potential new feature for Clankers?
options: A second new way to clank
questions.explanation: Dan Romero posted they were considering doing 'this AND Clanker Auctions,' referring to 'two new ways to clank' (12/22/2025).

questions.question: On one mini app, Jesse Pollak claimed the social role of what?
questions.explanation: Jesse Pollak states, 'I didn’t consider myself one but on this mini app I'm a TRADER!' (12/09/2025).

questions.question: According to Dan Romero, what is Base currently the most popular client on the protocol for?
questions.explanation: Dan Romero notes, 'Base is now the most popular client on protocol by messages sent' (12/18/2025).

questions.question: What is one of the specific technical terms related to webhooks that the App Studio update aims to help developers skip figuring out?
options: Parent URL, parent hash, and other technical terms
questions.explanation: The post explicitly mentions skipping 'what parent URL, parent hash, and other technical terms might mean' (12/23/2025).

questions.question: What financial activity does Jesse Pollak express the desire to resolve, rather than make or bet on?
questions.explanation: Jesse Pollak says, 'everyone wants to make or bet on prediction markets. i want to resolve them' (12/17/2025).

questions.question: Who did Jesse Pollak credit with setting up a specialized 'admin view' for tracking orders in a highly polished mini app?
questions.explanation: Jesse Pollak referenced 'the admin view that @priyanka set up for herself to see the orders coming in' (11/13/2025).

questions.question: What kind of app did Jesse Pollak recommend using, noting it was 'one of the most polished mini app built using the @neynar app studio' and transaction-enabled?
questions.explanation: Jesse Pollak recommended the print app, noting 'we have a bunch of them in our home' and that it was transaction-enabled (11/13/2025).

questions.question: What specific item/feature did Brian Armstrong state he felt guilty about cheating on, leading him to delete his top score?
questions.explanation: Brian Armstrong mentioned cheating on 'the snowman game' (12/22/2025).

questions.question: What is the specific description Brian Armstrong gives for the 'digital civilization' of the THEROBOT NFT collection?
options: Built for the metaverse and virtual reality.
Built at the edge of art and artificial intelligence.
questions.explanation: He describes it as 'a digital civilization built at the edge of art and artificial intelligence' (12/25/2025).

questions.question: What new feature is Dan Romero announcing will be displayed on the Farcaster app, originating from casts made on the Base app?
questions.explanation: Dan Romero announced they would start displaying 'content coins from Base app casts on the Farcaster app' (12/15/2025).

questions.question: What was Brian Armstrong's reported 'Vibe' identified in his Farcaster Rewind 2025, generated by the Neynar App Studio?
questions.explanation: The Farcaster Rewind posted by Brian Armstrong showed his Vibe as 'Quality Sniper' (12/22/2025).

questions.question: What are the core technical capabilities that Jesse Pollak states Neynar AI should add, specifically in the context of Farcaster?
questions.explanation: Priorities included 'Neynar AI: add agent capabilities, build in-feed agents on neynar' (11/26/2025).

questions.question: Which specific crypto/web3 project did Coinbase (Mircea Pasoi) build an incomplete Python port of in 2023 to understand how Hubs work?
questions.explanation: Mircea Pasoi built an incomplete 'Python port of @farcaster/hub-nodejs' (04/09/2023).

questions.question: Which company's new office opening was cited in a humorous post by Jesse Pollak as the reason an SF landlord raised rent?
questions.explanation: The landlord reportedly said 'Anthropic's new office opened nearby' (11/01/2025).

questions.question: What was the official Base account's focus when sharing a piece of media coverage in late 2022?
options: Comparing early internet journalism to crypto journalism.
questions.explanation: The cast linked to 'Cool piece on how early media coverage of the internet revolution compares to that of crypto reporting of today' (11/08/2022).

questions.question: Jesse Pollak suggests developers should aim to get their apps onto which specific listing during the holidays?
options: The App Store's Top Free list
questions.explanation: Jesse suggests, 'Get on the mini app charts' (12/24/2025).

questions.question: What type of product did Brian Armstrong muse about creating a mini app for, adding tokenomics to its structure?
questions.explanation: Brian posted, 'imagine - wikipedia miniapp with tokenomics' (12/23/2025).

questions.question: What specific type of query did Jesse Pollak make to Neynar regarding the entire Farcaster protocol's activity in November 2025?
options: The number of unique profile views.
The total number of casts in the past 24 hours.
The number of likes across the entire protocol in the past 24 hours.
questions.explanation: Jesse asked, 'how many likes across the entire farcaster protocol in the past 24 hours?' (11/01/2025).

questions.question: What three major goals were established for redesigning the Clanker launch feature after issues with presales?
options: Maximize speed, ensure low transaction costs, reward early buyers.
Broad/fair distribution, deep liquidity via price discovery, aligned economics.
Allow immediate refunds, utilize zero-knowledge proofs, integrate cross-chain swaps.
Centralized oversight, static pricing, simplified UI.
questions.explanation: Dan Romero listed the goals as: 'a. Broad and fair distribution. b. Trading starts with deep liquidity at a market cap determined through price discovery. c. Aligned economics' (12/15/2025).

questions.question: What mechanism did Dan Romero announce was rolling out to support Clanker tokens?
questions.explanation: Dan Romero posted, 'Automated Clanker buys rolling out' (12/16/2025).

questions.question: Which geopolitical situation did Dan Romero note prediction markets were still treating as a 'coin flip' in mid-December 2025?
questions.explanation: He linked to a Polymarket event on 'US X Venezuela military engagement' (12/17/2025).

questions.question: What UX issue did Brian Armstrong report regarding switching accounts on The Base App (TBA)?
options: It requires deleting and completely reimporting his wallet.
It often results in lost cast history.
The app crashes every time he attempts to switch.
questions.explanation: Brian stated it felt 'almost impossible to switch without having to completely delete & reimport my wallet' (12/21/2025).

questions.question: What is one of the specific consequences of the existing Clanker presale mechanism that Dan Romero aims to fix?
options: It rewards long-term alignment instead of speed.
Presale proceeds contribute too much to liquidity.
The mechanism rewards speed to buy, not long-term alignment.
questions.explanation: A key issue was that 'The mechanism rewards speed to buy, not long-term alignment' (12/15/2025).

questions.question: What cultural reference did Dan Romero use to contextualize the concept of prediction markets regarding the US/Venezuela conflict?
questions.explanation: Dan Romero explicitly linked to the Wikipedia page for the movie 'Wag the Dog' (12/17/2025).

questions.question: What data point did Brian Armstrong's Farcaster Rewind 2025 cite regarding his casting habit?
questions.explanation: His rewind summary included a '32-day streak' (12/22/2025).

questions.question: What method did Dan Romero state Base was using to support Clanker ecosystem projects?
options: Providing free Base NFTs to all Clanker holders.
Burning accumulated native token fees and redirecting ongoing fees to creators.
Sponsoring Clanker liquidity pools with ETH.
questions.explanation: Base 'Burned accumulated native token fees' and 'Redirected ongoing native token fees to creators' (12/16/2025).

questions.question: What term does Jesse Pollak use to describe the rapid creation of mini apps using App Studio in his top priorities list?
questions.explanation: The priority is 'App studio: vibe code mini apps' (11/26/2025).

questions.question: What was Brian Armstrong's general sentiment about his ability to program in his December 20th post?
options: He felt he was becoming a coding expert.
He stated he didn't know how to code anymore.
He was excited about learning Rust.
He was optimizing the Base layer.
questions.explanation: Brian posted, 'i don't know how to code anymore' (12/20/2025).

questions.question: What was the first role Coinbase (Mircea Pasoi) announced they were hiring for after closing their fundraising in November 2023?
questions.explanation: They announced the first role was 'a product designer' (11/17/2023).

questions.question: Who did Brian Armstrong hold a claim to after securing his place among the 2525 Apostles, related to the Gathering?
questions.explanation: He claims to be an Apostle, 'holding a claim to the The Spirit ($REDACTED)' (12/24/2025).

questions.question: What method of cooking assistance was Dan Romero utilizing ChatGPT for in late December 2025?
questions.explanation: Dan Romero mentioned using ChatGPT 'as a cooking thought partner quite a bit' (12/23/2025).

questions.question: What did the official Base account mention they had doubled in the previous week in a March 2024 post?
questions.explanation: The post referenced 'last week we doubled our revenue and I have no idea why' (03/15/2024).

questions.question: Jesse Pollak implied that using Farcaster through which specific app would NOT negatively affect a user's Neynar score?
questions.explanation: Jesse posted, 'Using farcaster through the Base app does not lower your Neynar score' (10/15/2025).

questions.question: What is one of the explicit downsides of the existing Clanker presale mechanism (v4) that led to the redesign?
options: It only allows cancellation and refunds.
It only allows ETH as payment.
questions.explanation: Dan Romero stated, 'There’s no built-in price discovery; the team picks a % sold and an ETH amount' (12/15/2025).

questions.question: What type of question did Jesse Pollak specifically ask Neynar to analyze his casts for over the last year?
questions.explanation: He asked Neynar to 'analyze my casts over the last year and tell me my biggest weakness' (11/18/2025).

questions.question: When building his warplet mashup, who did Brian Armstrong mention he mashed it up with, in addition to @to?
questions.explanation: He listed 'i mashed up my warplet with @to @twochanz.eth @pichi' (12/21/2025).

questions.question: Jesse Pollak mentioned that the massive leap in AI exploit revenue potential was seen in the vulnerability benchmark of which institution?
questions.explanation: The link provided was to red.anthropic.com (12/02/2025).

questions.question: What is the implied new Clanker feature that Dan Romero is considering alongside Clanker Auctions (referred to generally as 'this')?
options: A mechanism to create tokens (a way to clank)
A new staking pool for Base ETH
An automated bot for collecting NFTs
questions.explanation: He stated they are considering 'this AND Clanker Auctions' and noted they were 'So two new ways to clank' (12/22/2025).

questions.question: What specific user data point did Jesse Pollak ask Neynar to provide regarding his Farcaster activity in October 2025?
options: His top 5 users he replies to the most.
His most commonly used word in casts.
questions.explanation: Jesse asked, 'who do you reply to the most? give me the top 5 users' (10/15/2025).

questions.question: What does Brian Armstrong say he loves the vibe of, specifically calling it 'a different miniapp experience'?
questions.explanation: Brian posted, 'man i love the vibe of cat town a different miniapp experience' (12/24/2025).

questions.question: What key component of the Clanker presale mechanism does Dan Romero note does NOT contribute to the token’s liquidity at launch?
questions.explanation: One of the issues cited was that 'Presale proceeds do not contribute to the token’s liquidity at launch' (12/15/2025).

questions.question: What did Coinbase (Mircea Pasoi) state he recently found out about himself in November 2023?
options: He was elected to the Farcaster DAO.
He was on the autism spectrum.
He had secured a new role at Anthropic.
questions.explanation: He shared a personal story: 'I’ve recently found out I’m on the autism spectrum' (11/09/2023).
